Question
========

When testing for a coefficient from a multiple regression with three *explanatory variables*, the null hypothesis that states that the coefficient is 0 against the alternative that the coefficient is unequal to 0 is. The coefficient is *b*~1~ = 2.3 with *se* = 0.8 and there are 13 degrees of freedom. Then the null hypothesis

Answerlist
----------

* Be rejected at 0.02 but not at 0.10.
* Be rejected at 0.05 but not at 0.02.
* Be rejected at 0.02 but not at 0.01.

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* Are rejected at 0.02 but not at 0.10.: Incorrect
* Are rejected at 0.05 but not at 0.02.: Incorrect
* Are rejected at 0.02 but not at 0.01.: Correct
